description: Returns the CloudFormation stack record created as a result of the create cloud formation stack operation. An AWS CloudFormation stack is used to create a new Amazon EC2 instance from an exported Lightsail snapshot.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetClouFormationStackRecords request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: cloudFormationStackRecords
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the CloudFormation stack records.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudFormation stack record. It starts with CloudFormationStackRecord followed by a GUID.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudFormation stack record.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the CloudFormation stack record was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the CloudFormation stack record.

nested_items.name: sourceInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the source of the CloudFormation stack record.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the export snapshot record.

nested_items.name: destinationInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the destination service, which is AWS CloudFormation, and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS CloudFormation stack.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource created at the destination.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: The destination service of the record.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
